body_html:
Dylan, well, the problem Bazel does have is that it doesn't notice changes/upgrade of your compiler, if you don't put all the files as cc_toolchain inputs, which we don't in our autodetection of C++ toolchain.

What version of bazel do you have, and on what platforms are you on? Did you use cuda?
body_text:
Dylan, well, the problem Bazel does have is that it doesn't notice changes/upgrade of your compiler, if you don't put all the files as cc_toolchain inputs, which we don't in our autodetection of C++ toolchain.
What version of bazel do you have, and on what platforms are you on? Did you use cuda?
body:
Dylan, well, the problem Bazel does have is that it doesn't notice changes/upgrade of your compiler, if you don't put all the files as `cc_toolchain` inputs, which we don't in our autodetection of C++ toolchain.

What version of bazel do you have, and on what platforms are you on? Did you use cuda?
